column1: Local Foods////A very trendy place to hangout for lunch or dinner. When looking at the menu
column2: there are 8 sandwiches to choose from. I heard their menu changes since they have been open
column3: so I'm thinking they are coordinating with the availability of the ingredients based on the season. Interesting side orders come with the sandwiches liked the Tuscan Kale or Orzo. I went on a Sunday evening and it was quiet but I would expect this place to be busy during the weekday lunch hours. What really impressed me were their fresh ingredients. To see everything made from scratch got me coming back.
